name: (EN) Captain Glouglou's Incredible Week !
description:
Version française du jeu https://monplaisir.itch.io/captain-glouglou-fr-version

If the music doesn't start automatically after ten seconds, please play it here :

You play Captain Glouglou, a happy alpaga, during a week. Captain Glouglou has a lot of possible activities to do, and a lot of lovable friends to see and talk with. Have fun !

This is my first game, be cool and don't hesitate to leave feedbacks =)

The soundtrack of the game is available here.

Thanks Claire Morley for the helpful tutorial available here : http://www.clairemorleyart.com/a-bitsy-tutorial

Thanks Adam Ledoux for the amazing tool called bitsy : https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy
